articles.content: Mumbai: Analysts at most leading brokerages raised their price targets on Reliance Industries (RIL) after its first quarter results. Out of the 31 brokerages whose ratings and price targets are uploa… [+1468 chars]

articles.title: Cotton industry to see revival in FY24 - The Financial Express
articles.description: According to a CareEdge report, the Indian cotton yarn industry is likely to register a sales volume growth of 5-7%, while the operating margin is expected to expand by 100-150 bps in FY24 compared to FY23.
articles.content: After a lacklustre year, the cotton industry is keenly anticipating a revival with a sales volume expected to grow by 5-7% over last year. Industry observers maintain that the optimism is pegged on f… [+3787 chars]
